entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning early this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
